last_episode_to_air.name: Corner
last_episode_to_air.overview: Yan Liang and Zhu Chaoyang finally decide to take down Dong Sheng; Zhu Chaoyang tells the police what he knows and starts from the beginning.

name: The Bad Kids
overview: A story that follows three children from a coastal town who unintentionally film a murder scene. As the kids become involved with the suspect, it opens up a case that is far more complicated than it looks and entraps several families into an unpredictable outcome.

episodes.name: Summer Break
episodes.overview: In the summer of 2005, a meeting takes place at the middle school of a small seaside town ahead of summer vacation.

episodes.name: Alarm
episodes.overview: Zhang Dongsheng looks guilty as he is questioned by the police. The three kids decide to remind the murderer about what they know, and send a warning letter.

episodes.name: Children's Palace
episodes.overview: Zhu Chaoyang takes advantage of Zhang Dongsheng's carelessness and plants the warning letter; Zhu Jingjing convinces Pu Pu to stop bullying her.

episodes.name: Trading
episodes.overview: Zhang Dongsheng confirms that the children have video evidence of the crime after following the trail of the warning letter.

episodes.name: Mom
episodes.overview: Wang Yao visits Zhu Chaoyang's home, and Zhu flees in fear that he knows he was responsible for the death of his daughter.

episodes.name: Flies
episodes.overview: Wang Yao is desperate to find out the truth, and will stop at nothing; Yan Liang goes to the secret meeting place and finds Lao Chen waiting for her.

episodes.name: Diary
episodes.overview: Father Zhu starts swimming with Chaoyang to make up for his lost father and son time; Zhu Chaoyang goes to Zhang Dongsheng's home to negotiate terms of peace.

episodes.name: Outsider
episodes.overview: As the crime continues to ravage the town, the children grow more and more impatient with the suspects and take matters into their own hands.

episodes.name: Typhoon
episodes.overview: Wang Yao's younger brother takes Zhu Chaoyang to the fishery to torture him for information; Zhang Dongsheng fights with Wang Li as he asks for money.

episodes.name: Uncle Zhang
episodes.overview: Zhu Ma asks the police about Zhu Chaoyang's situation, and she discovers she's been lying; Zhang Dongsheng feels betrayed by Yan Liang yet again.

episodes.name: Burning
episodes.overview: Zhang Dongsheng, Yan Liang, and Zhu Chaoyang make a lucrative deal; Wang Yao and Zhu Yongping stumble into an unfortunate situation and violence ensues.

episodes.name: Corner
episodes.overview: Yan Liang and Zhu Chaoyang finally decide to take down Dong Sheng; Zhu Chaoyang tells the police what he knows and starts from the beginning.
